Wave.FifthPlayerJoined: {green}[!wave]{default} A 9th player joined the server. Bot Waves disabled.
Wave.FifthPlayerJoinedThanks: {lime}Thanks for helping populate the server! Enjoy the regular AWP gameplay.
Wave.HelpCustomWave: {green}[!wave]{default} Use {lime}!wave <number>{default} to start at a specific wave (e.g., !wave 10)
Wave.HelpTurnOff: {green}[!wave]{default} Use {lime}!wave off{default} to disable wave mode
Wave.DifficultyReduced: {green}[!wave]{default} Difficulty reduced! Wave {0} reduced from {1} to {2} bots ({3} removed)
Wave.SpawnLimitReached: {green}[!wave]{default} Only {0} bots fit on map. {1} will re-spawn!
Wave.NoMoreRespawns: {green}[!wave]{default} No more bot re-spawns! Kill the rest!
